meanings.definition: Coming near or nearer in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The approaching storm darkened the sky.
meanings.sent2: The approaching deadline made me nervous.
meanings.sent3: The approaching weekend brought a sense of relief.
meanings.sent4: The approaching footsteps echoed in the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The approaching train whistle pierced the silence.

meanings.definition: Coming close to in quantity, quality, or degree.
meanings.sent2: The approaching winter promised snow and cold.
meanings.sent3: The approaching sale tempted me to buy more.
meanings.sent4: The approaching decision weighed heavily on my mind.
meanings.sent5: The approaching finish line motivated the runners.
